desc:

You deal {c_number}[{SF_6} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Damage to Stunned and {c_important}Vulnerable{/c} enemies while {c_important}Berserking{/c}.{/if}
name: Two-Handed Mace Expertise
rankup_desc: Chance to activate Lucky Hit increased to {c_number}{SF_3}%{/c}.
